channel.title: ~99 Constitution party~
channel.description:
[center]Hey Moparscape this is Juggalo here to bring to you my level 125 Runescape account
I am currently working on getting 99 defence at the moment while im achieving that I will have 99 constitution by the next few days im currently 98 constitution right now with 449k experience left till I hit 99 constitution im 450k experience away from 96 defence.
If you would like to add me/look me up my username is Radomweed420
You guys may know me as a v 3 x I use to hybrid rush d claws with 9mm k0 before he got banned
If there is any support or help you guys can give me then please do
Hope to see you add me and be at my 99 constitution party![/center]

item.title: ~99 Constitution party~
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“zoomer, post:4, topic:362228”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=458514.msg3355287#msg3355287 date=1285770454]
psst - if ur just training def, you get 1/3 the constitution experience. so in other words, you’ll level defence (maybe even 2 lvls) before constitution
[/quote]

And if you knew anything about jagex’s programming then your a dumb ass please don’t leave comments that don’t have 1 thing right kid im already 97 defence from posting this last night and i was 95 and im 205k till 99 hp so stfu.[/quote]I’m pretty sure I said you’d gain at least 2 defense levels before leveling constitution… so didn’t you just prove me right?

And my comment was mean or anything, so why did you rage?

Read full topic
